name: Daisy Mini Perfume Set
details: Fragrance Description: Daisy is infused with succulent- wild berries and soft white violets. At the heart- velvety jasmine warms to a dreamy drydown of sensual sandalwood for a romantic- lingering finish. Sophisticated but not too serious- Daisy Eau So Fresh sparkles with a sunny- vibrant energy. A spirited incarnation of the original Daisy- this fragrance excites the senses with a bright elegance and whimsical charm. Like the woman who wears it- Daisy Eau So Fresh inspires boldness and femininity- sweetness and unpredictability. The scent's enticing top notes of raspberry and grapefruit sparkle on the skin like sunshine- deepening into a sensuous heart of wild rose and a musky- sophisticated finish of warm plum and cedarwood. Addictive and irresistible- Daisy Love fills the air with a contagious love of life. Created by master perfumer Alberto Morillas- this gourmand radiant fragrance reveals its first notes in a vibrant burst of sweet cloudberries. Delicate daisy tree petals mingle with sparkling cashmere musks and driftwood to create a lasting and memorable gourmand twist.This set contains:- 3 x 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Eau de Toilette pen sprays in Daisy- Daisy Eau So Fresh- and Daisy LoveAbout the Fragrance: Charmingly simple with a signature quality- Marc Jacobs Daisy transports you to a place that optimistic- beautiful- and pure.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

details:
Fragrance Family: Floral

Scent Type: Warm Florals

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

details: Fragrance Family: Floral Scent Type: Warm Floral Key Notes: Cyrstallized Cloudberries- Daisy Tree Petals- Cashmere Musks- Driftwood Fragrance Description: Addictive and irresistible- Daisy Love fills the air with a contagious love of life. Created by master perfumer Alberto Morillas- this gourmand radiant fragrance reveals its first notes in a vibrant burst of sweet cloudberries. Delicate daisy tree petals mingle with sparkling cashmere musks and driftwood to create a lasting and memorable gourmand twist. About the Bottle: An ode to the Marc Jacobs iconic daisy- Daisy Love blooms with an oversized daisy that reflects over the warm glow of the juice.This set contains:- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Eau de Toilette- Daisy Love Lip Gloss
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Penspray Trio
details: Charmingly simple with a signature quality- Daisy Marc Jacobs transports you to a place that’s optimistic- beautiful- and pure. The top of the fragrance is infused with succulent wild berries and soft white violets. At the heart- velvety jasmine warms to a dreamy dry-down of sensual sandalwood- for a romantic- lingering finish. Sophisticated but not too serious- Daisy Eau So Fresh sparkles with a sunny- vibrant energy. A spirited incarnation of the original Daisy- this fragrance excites the senses with a bright elegance and whimsical charm. Like the woman who wears it- Daisy Eau So Fresh inspires boldness and femininity- sweetness and unpredictability. The scent's enticing top notes of raspberry and grapefruit sparkle on the skin like sunshine- deepening into a sensuous heart of wild rose and a musky- sophisticated finish of warm plum and cedarwood. Addictive and irresistible- Daisy Love fills the air with a contagious love of life. Created by master perfumer Alberto Morillas- this gourmand radiant fragrance reveals its first notes in a vibrant burst of sweet cloudberries. Delicate daisy tree petals mingle with sparkling cashmere musks and driftwood to create a lasting and memorable gourmand twist. This set contains:- 3 x 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Eau de Toilette pen sprays in Daisy- Daisy Eau So Fresh- and Daisy Love
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: L'Eau Bleue & L'Eau Rosée Duo
details: Fragrance Family: FreshScent Type: Fresh FloralFragrance Description: Miu Miu L’Eau Rosée Eau de Toilette captures the spirit of the Miu Miu girl. This soft floral fragrance created from lily of the valley and cassis buds is tightly wrapped in notes of sophisticated musk. Miu Miu L'Eau Bleue is a perfume that evokes the essence of early spring and new beginnings. This fresh floral Eau de Parfum captures the essence of lily of the valley at its most seductive- still glistening with dew as it blooms in the cool spring dawn. name: Smart Styling Infrared Hair Dryer
details: What it is: A professional infrared hair dryer that saves energy while minimizing thermal exposure for beautifully styled- healthy-looking hair.Hair Type: Straight- Wavy- Curly- and CoilyHair Texture: Fine- Medium- and ThickWhat Else You Need to Know: This lightweight hair dryer uses far-infrared rays to gently heat strands- reducing thermal exposure and locking in moisture. The patented heating element features a ceramic core for precision styling and faster drying time- leaving hair shiny and smooth.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Plug the hair dryer into a power supply. The heat level and fan speed can be controlled independently using the upper and lower switches.-The lower switch controls fan speed. When the switch is in the bottom position- the fan is turned off. Move the lower switch to the center position for low fan speed or the top position for high fan speed.-The upper switch controls heat level. When the switch is in the bottom position- the heat is turned off. Move the upper switch to the center position for low heat or the top position for high heat.-The cool shot button may be used to set a hairstyle after blow-drying. Click and hold to engage the cool shot feature and release to disengage.-After use- make sure both switches are in the left (O) position before unplugging.

This Care Meets Color set is designed for use on dark-colored hair and includes a single-use Color Depositing Mask in Cocoa- which nourishes hair and adds temporary color. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Color Depositing Mask:-Please note that Cocoa is for use on light brown to dark brown hair only. -Before committing to a full head of color- conduct a strand test to assess results.-Start with clean- towel-dried hair.-Section hair and apply a generous amount. Distribute evenly using a wide-tooth comb.-Leave on for five to seven minutes- depending on desired intensity.-Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.-Minimal staining may occur but can be easily removed with soap and water.Dry Shampoo Dark Tones:-Shake well.-Spray six to eight inches away from dry roots.-Let hair dry- then massage into scalp as you would with wet shampoo.-Brush hair out.Moroccanoil Treatment: -Apply a small amount to clean- towel-dried hair- from mid-lengths to ends.-Blow-dry or let hair dry naturally.

name: Smoothing Conditioner Mini
details:
Which hair type is it good for?✔ Straight✔ Wavy✔ Curly✔ Coiled✔  Tightly Coiled

details: What it is: A travel-ready set featuring four fan-favorites from the Moroccanoil Volume Collection.Hair Type: Straight- Wavy- Curly- and CoilyHair Texture: Fine- Medium- and ThickKey Benefits: - Fights frizz- Adds Shine- Adds Volume Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: Hydrates and nourishes the hair.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- formaldehyde-releasing agents- mineral oil- retinyl palmitate- oxybenzone- coal tar- hydroquinone- triclosan- and triclocarban- and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product also comes in recyclable packaging.What Else You Need to Know: Achieve volume wherever you are with this TSA-approved set. Created for those with fine- thin- or limp hair- it can be used on the go as a start-to-finish styling routine that results in all-over body with a soft- touchable finish. This travel set features the Extra Volume Shampoo and Conditioner to gently cleanse and nourish without weighing hair down- the Root Boost to amplify hair at the root- and the Moroccanoil Treatment Light to provide all the nourishing benefits of our iconic original treatment in a lightweight formulation ideal for fine hair.This Set Contains:- 2.4 oz/ 71 mL Extra Volume Shampoo- 2.4 oz/ 71 mL Extra Volume Conditioner- 2.5 oz/ 74 mL Root Boost- 0.85 oz/ 25 mL Moroccanoil Treatment Light
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Extra Volume Shampoo: -Apply throughout wet hair and scalp- gently massaging to stimulate the shampoo’s volume-boosting properties.-Add more water to activate a rich- luxurious lather from the concentrated formula.-Rinse thoroughly until water runs clear.-Repeat as necessary.Extra Volume Conditioner: -After shampooing- squeeze excess water and apply conditioner from mid-lengths to ends.-Leave on for one to two minutes and rinse well.-Use regularly for best results.Root Boost:-Shake can well and spray on towel-dried hair at the roots.-Using a round brush- blow-dry in sections- lifting hair away from the scalp.Moroccanoil Treatment Light: -Apply a small amount to clean- towel-dried hair from mid-lengths to ends.-Blow-dry or let dry naturally.-Apply on dry hair to tame flyaways- condition split ends- and smooth hair. Precautions:Root Boost:-Use only as directed.-Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact- rinse immediately with water.-For external use only.-Contents under pressure. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 120°F (49°C).-Warning: Extremely Flammable: Keep away from sources of ignition—avoid fire- flame- and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry.-Do not place in hot water or near radiators- stoves- or other sources of heat.-Do not use in the presence of an open flame or spark.-Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal.-Keep out of reach of children.

name: Everlasting Curl Titanium Curling Iron
details: What it is: A curling iron that delivers lasting curls and features an extra-long titanium barrel for even heat distribution and fast- frizz-free results.  Hair Type: Straight- Wavy- Curly- and CoilyHair Texture: Fine- Medium- and ThickWhat Else You Need to Know:  This soft-touch curling iron combines advanced technology with ease of use to create beautiful- long-lasting curls. The extra-long- one-inch-diameter titanium barrel maximizes surface area for fast performance and plenty of room to wrap long or thick hair. It comes with a heat-resistant pouch
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Divide hair into one-inch sections and lightly spray Perfect Defense (sold separately) throughout.-Select desired temperature. For fine hair- use a lower heat setting. For medium to coarse hair- use a higher heat setting.-Wrap a section of hair around the barrel of the curling iron- slide down the barrel to the end without the iron letting go of the hair- then continue to wrap hair around the iron until you’re near the root.-Hold for up to 15 seconds- then release.-Repeat on each remaining section of hair.- Tip: To use as a wand- wind each section of hair around the barrel of the curling iron without closing the shell.

name: MOSCHINO TOY BOY Travel Spray
options: - 0.3 oz/ 10 mL Eau de Parfum Spray
details: Fragrance Family: Warm & SpicyScent Type: Woody SpicesKey Notes: Italian Bergamot- Clove Buds- Vetiver Haiti OrpurFragrance Description: Toy Boy is the new- exclusive fragrance by Moschino that reinterprets elegance with a touch of irony. It speaks to a unique- dynamic- enthusiastic- and passionate person.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.
ingredients: Alchohol Denat. (SD Alchohol 39-C)- Parfum (Fragrance)- Aqua (Water)- Limonene- Linalool- Eugenol- Cinnamal- Citral- Isoeugenol.

name: Naked In Neon Nail Polish set
details: What it is: A set of high-performance neon and nude nail polishes. What Else You Need to Know: With this set- you can follow the neon and nude nail polish trend that involves painting each nail with a different neon shade offset by the perfect nude—creating a super cool touch of chic. It includes NAILS INC.’s best neon formulation to date: fully pigmented polish with no white base activator needed. Wear the neon alone for a full-on bright look- or wear with the nude for the latest ombré manicure look. Each is easy to apply with the patented- wide-hugging brush that’s ergonomically designed to work with the shape of the nail and minimize the number of strokes required—creating an immaculate finish. name: Mini Sunkissed Perfume & Glow Set
details: Fragrance Family: FloralsScent Type: Warm FloralsKey Notes: Frangipani- Orange Blossom- Golden AmberFragrance Description: Wrap yourself in Sunkissed Hibiscus bliss with this scent and glow duo that blends radiant notes of frangipani and orange with warm golden amber. The moisturizing Dry Body Oil Mist imparts the look of a subtle glow while the Eau de Parfum further scents the skin.About the Bottle: Inspired by the works of 18th Century British artist Mrs. Mary Delany- NEST New York founder- Laura Slatkin- collaborated with master perfumers to translate these works of art into luxurious fragrances that capture the essence of each of the botanicals that adorn the products' striking packaging.This Set Contains:- 0.34 oz/ 10 mL Dry Body Oil Mist - 0.2 oz/ 6 mL Eau de Parfum Rollerball About the Fragrance: At the heart of Sunkissed Hibiscus is warm- sensual golden amber wrapped in layers of lush floral notes that include orange blossom- gardenia- and tuberose. Notes of tropical frangipani flower with hints of creamy coconut round out this mellow scent that wraps you in bliss.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.
ingredients: unknown

name: Apple Blossom Reed Diffuser
details: What it is: A reed diffuser with luscious notes of crisp red apples enhanced by the aroma of apple blossoms and the warmth of white amber and cedarwood.Fragrance Family: Earthy & WoodyScent Type: Warm & Sweet GourmandsKey Notes: Apple Blossom- White Amber- CedarwoodFragrance Description: Apple Blossom was inspired by the possibility of a brighter future for those affected by autism. The formula releases fragrance slowly and evenly.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Always use your reed diffuser on a stable surface.-Remove the bottle stopper and place the hand-crafted reeds in the bottle.-The alcohol-free formula releases fragrance slowly and evenly into the air for approximately 90 days.-To intensify the fragrance- occasionally flip the reeds over.

details:

This lightweight- water-soluble paste is infused with a pliable blend of natural actives. It delivers flexible texturising hold and a healthy shine without any residue. C-Paste is infused with coconut oil to provide pliable hold- offer flexible texture in the hair- and deliver a hit of hydration and natural shine. details: What it is:  A must-have trio that exfoliates- resurfaces- brightens- and plumps the look of lackluster skin.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture- Dark Spots- and Fine Lines and WrinklesFormulation: Lightweight LiquidHighlighted Ingredients:- AHA: Helps support a brighter- clear-looking- younger-appearing- and more even-toned complexion. - BHA: Supports cell renewal and improves hyper-pigmentation. - Vitamin C: Prevents the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by supporting the natural production of collagen.  Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know:  The Daily Vitamin C Serum brightens and protects with a highly stable and potent form of this antioxidant-rich vitamin. The Acid Fix treatment is a multi-purpose treatment with glycolic- salicylic- and lactic acid to exfoliate- resurface- brighten- and plump the look of lackluster skin. Finally- the Refining Facial Polisher is enriched with marine micro-algae to refine texture and brighten skin’s tone- while natural pumice frees skin of flakiness and roughness.This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30 mL Acid Fix- 1 oz/ 30 mL Refining Facial Polisher- 0.16 oz/ mL Daily Vitamin C SerumClean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients- including sulfates (SLS and SLES)- parabens- phthalates- and more. For the full list- check out the Ingredients tab.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Refining Facial Polisher: -Apply and massage in a circular motion from the nose area outward. -As you buff- the polisher will turn from emerald green to pearlescent grey- revealing the moor mud. -Leave on for two minutes then rinse thoroughly with warm water. -Finish with the application of a serum or moisturizer. -Use one to two times per week.                                                                                                                                                                                                           Acid Fix: -Apply two to three drops at night after cleansing and follow with your usual moisturizer. -Use two to three times weekly. Daily Vitamin C Serum: -Apply after cleansing and toning. -Suitable for daily use. Precautions:-Slight irritation may occur and indicates the product is working. -When using acid products- always avoid sun exposure.

name: Retinol 0.2% in Squalane
details: What it is:  A solution that contains retinol- an ingredient that can reduce the appearances of fine lines and photo damage.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles- Uneven Texture- and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity. Formulation: Lightweight SerumIngredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product is also vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free- comes in recyclable packaging. What Else You Need to Know: This water-free serum contains 0.2 percent of pure Retinol- an ingredient that can reduce the appearances of fine lines- photo damage- textural irregularities- and the general look of skin aging.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply a small amount to face in the PM as part of your skincare regimen- after water-based serums but before heavier treatments.  Precautions:-Do not use with other retinoid treatments. -Avoid unprotected solar exposure. -Caution: Retinol can cause irritation- redness and peeling—especially around the eyes and mouth—in the early stages of treatment while skin builds tolerance. -If persistent irritation occurs- cease use and consult a physician. -Use only as directed on unbroken skin. -Patch testing prior to use is advised. Refer to The Ordinary’s in-depth guide to patch testing. -Keep out of reach of children. -Refrigerate after opening.
ingredients: Squalane- Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride- Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil- Retinol- Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract- Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract- Hydroxymethoxyphenyl Decanone- BHT.

name: Anamorphine Holo Candle
details: Fragrance Family: FloralsScent Type: Fresh FloralsKey Notes: Pink Peonies- Raspberry Lemonade- Kaffir Lemon Leave InfusionFragrance Description: Anamorphine is an immersive fragrance that diffuses the most delicate nuances of peony blossom- enveloped with a fresh rose petal aroma. The fruitiness of raspberries adds a refreshing fizzy sensation and a dash of kaffir lime leaf infuses a delightful aroma to the melange.    About the Candle: This candle is housed in Overose's signature holographic design. All Overose candles are formulated with essential oils and dreamy fragrances to burn cleanly with an excellent cold and hot throw. They are cruelty-free- vegan- and free of phthalates with a 60-hour burn time.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:Overose candles are crafted in the finest wax and aromatics available. To make sure your candle burns beautifully- Overose recommends you to :
-Let it burn long enough to melt the entire surface on top of the candle for three hours the first time you light it.
-Burn the candle for two or three hours at a time.
-Re-center the wick towards the middle once you blow the flame.
-Regularly trim the wick to one-fourth-inch long to avoid smoke and get a longer burn.

details: What it is: A dual-ended tool made from 100 percent cruelty-free synthetic bristles for perfecting your brows.What Else You Need to Know: One end is a soft spoolie for grooming and shaping and the other is an angled brush for creating precise- hair-like strokes and filling in with a powder or pomade of your choice. This brush is made with 100 percent cruelty-free synthetic bristles.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-To clean- gently wash with warm water and a mild cleanser.-Lay flat to dry.

name: Major Brow Shaping Wax
details: What it is: An innovative defining wax that will maximize the shape of your brows.Highlighted Ingredients: - Growth Peptides: Support healthy new growth.- Glycerine and Olive Oil: Condition- soften- and protect the brows and skin.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- formaldehyde-releasing agents- phthalates- mineral oil- retinyl palmitate- oxybenzone- coal tar- hydroquinone- triclosan- and triclocarban- and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: Strong yet flexible- a few upward strokes of this formula tames and sets even the most stubborn brows into a perfectly pushed-up- feathered- and full look.  Patrick's technique: "For that full- brushed-up look I've been doing- I start by really wetting the product before picking it up with my spoolie. Then I comb the product through the brows- brushing upwards- making sure each hair is thoroughly coated and wet. Let the product dry down for a second- just enough to get tacky- then use the handle of your spoolie to press the hair into place in an upward motion- "laminating" the brows against the skin. You can then gently brush through and shape them as you want. The great thing about this formula is that it's strong- but not stiff or crunchy- and you can just brush through and reshape throughout the day."
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Activate the formula with a drop of setting mist or water. -Brush a spoolie or a firm brush into the pan to pick up a small amount of wax.-Brush through clean brows in an upward- outward motion. -Shape as desired.
ingredients: -Growth Peptides: Support healthy new growth.-Glycerine and Olive Oil: Condition- soften- and protect the brows and skin.	Glycerin- Aqua (Water- Eau)- Sodium Stearate- Sodium Oleate- Sorbitol- Sodium Laurate- Sodium Myristate- Sodium Chloride- Stearic Acid- Lauric Acid- Pentasodium Pentetate- Tetrasodium Etidronate- Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17- Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil- May Contain +/-: Titanium Dioxide- Iron Oxides (Ci 77491- Ci 77492- Ci 77499).

name: Neuropeptide Night Cream
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive
What it is:An evening moisturizer that visibly and dramatically softens deep lines and creases- while deeply nourishing and hydrating skin.    
Solutions for:
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Loss of firmness and elasticity
- Dryness
If you want to know more… Twenty years of research has yielded Perricone MD’s most advanced and comprehensive night treatment cream. This ultra-rich moisturizer works overnight to nourish skin with essential hydration and over time- actively fights the appearance of deep lines and wrinkles- including nasolabial folds and marionette lines. Wake up to dramatically younger- smoother- healthier-looking skin.     
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Massage onto cleansed face and neck in the evening using a gentle upward motion.-Wait until fully absorbed- then follow with your favorite Perricone MD moisturizer if necessary.
ingredients:
-Neuropeptides: Offer the ultimate visible antidote for wrinkles- sagging- dullness- and discoloration.

Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: Secret Genius Candle
details: Fragrance Description: This candle has an inviting blend of vanilla- caramel- and sandalwood for a sophisticated scent that is as smart as it is beautiful.About the Candle: PINROSE’s 100 percent cotton-wicked candles are made in the USA from apricot and coconut wax with no paraffins. This candle has up to 80 hours of burn time.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Handle with care—this jar is fragile and may become hot when in use.  -Always place on heat-resistant surface. -Trim wick to a quarter inch before lighting. -Burn candle on protected surface free from flammable materials and drafts for maximum of two hours—extinguish immediately if black smoke appears.  -Allow to cool before relighting or touching.  -Do not drop foreign matter or wick trimmings into candle. -Discontinue use when a half inch of wax remains.

name: Candy Night Rollerball
details: Fragrance Family: Warm and SpicyScent Type: Warm and Sweet GourmandsKey Notes: Iris Aldehydes- Chocolate- MuskFragrance Description: Taking its cues from neon-lit cityscapes and their kaleidoscopic delights- Prada Candy Night captures the unbounded freedom found after dark. Bright- bitter orange and vivid iris aldehyde inject vibrant color into a heart of patchouli- musk- and tonka bean. A seductive overture of rich cocoa absolute ensures irresistible depth.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: R+R Cream Advanced CBD Recovery Rub for Soothing Comfort
details:
What it is:  An advanced recovery rub for soothing- whole-body comfort- featuring concentrated levels of broad-spectrum hemp extract with naturally occurring CBD. Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Formulation: Rich Lotion Highlighted Ingredients:- 750 mg Broad-Spectrum Hemp CBD: Helps to naturally support the skin and provide balance while combatting environmental stressors. - Menthol: Features a cooling sensation and aromatherapeutic qualities to encourage total relaxation. - Eucalyptus: Naturally beneficial terpenes (like limonene- camphor- and citronellol) and antioxidants soothe areas of the body in need of extra attention.  Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan- cruelty-free- gluten-free- and comes in recyclable packaging.  What Else You Need to Know:  With beneficial botanicals like tea tree- lavender- rosemary- peppermint- and 750 mg of broad-spectrum hemp CBD- this body-loving cream combines Prima’s three favorite Rs: rest- relaxation- and really good CBD. MarulCBD AT SEPHORA:
If it’s here- it’s the best- this is how we decide what makes the cut. 
1. Only full- or broad-spectrum CBD from US grown hemp 
2. Tested at least three times for quality and purity 3. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) to verify the formula matches the label 
4. Meets our Clean at Sephora standards P.S. CBD won’t get you high! For more detail- check out the Ingredients tab.a oil and shea butter deliver intense hydration with a non-greasy feel.Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients- including sulfates (SLS and SLES)- parabens- phthalates- and more. For the full list- check out the Ingredients tab.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Rub as needed on areas in need of extra attention and feel the difference.-Perfect for a nice sigh of relief after a strenuous workout or a long- taxing day.
ingredients:
-750 mg Broad Spectrum Hemp CBD: Helps to naturally support the skin and provide balance while combatting environmental stressors. -Menthol: Features a cooling sensation and aromatherapeutic qualities to encourage total relaxation. -Eucalyptus: Naturally beneficial terpenes (like limonene- camphor- and citronellol) and antioxidants soothe areas of the body in need of extra attention.  Water (Aqua)- Caprylyl Caprylate/ Caprate- Glycerin- Glyceryl Stearate- Cetearyl Alcohol- Cetearyl Olivate- Cetyl Alcohol- Sorbitan Olivate- Potassium Cetyl Phosphate- Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil- Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract- Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter- Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil- Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil- Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil- Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil- Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil- Sodium Dehydroacetate- Tetradecane- Phenethyl Alcohol- Menthol- Caprylhydroxamic Acid- Sodium Hydroxide- Xanthan Gum. Clean at Sephora products are formulated without:Sulfates—SLS + SLES- Parabens- Formaldehydes- Formaldehyde-releasing agents- Phthalates- Mineral Oil- Retinyl Palmitate- Oxybenzone- Coal Tar- Hydroquinone- Triclosan- Triclocarban- Undisclosed synthetic fragrances (Products can be formulated with disclosed synthetic fragrances that meet the following two criteria: (1) the synthetic fragrances do not include any of the ingredients listed in numbers 1 through 12 above and (2) the synthetic fragrances are at a concentration below 1% of the total formula) The following type of acrylates: (ethyl acrylate- ethyl methacrylate- methyl methacrylate- butyl methacrylate- hydroxypropyl methacrylate- tetrahydrofurfuryl methacrylate- trimethylolpropane trimethacrylate - aluminum salts)- Animal Oils/Musks/Fats- Benzophenone + Related Compounds- Butoxyethanol- Carbon Black- Lead/Lead Acetate- Methyl Cellosolve + Methoxyethanol- Methylchloroisothiazolinone & Methylisothiazolinone- Mercury + Mercury Compounds (Thimerisol)- Insoluble Plastic Microbeads (This prohibited ingredient applies to products that are meant to be rinsed off )- Resorcinol- Talc (Talc that is free of any asbestos can be used in the formulation provided that Brand conducts testing to ensure that talc is free of any asbestos.)- Toluene- Butylated hydroxyanisole (BHA)- Butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT) that is 0.1% or more of total formula- Ethanolamines DEA/TEA/MEA/ETA- Nanoparticles as defined by the European Commission- Petrolatum and Parrafin that is not USP grade- Phenoxyethanol that is 1% or more of total formulation- Polyacrylamide & Acrylamide- The following types of Styrene (Bromostyrene- Deastyrene/acrylates/dvbcopolymer- sodium styrene/divinylbenzene copolymer - styrene oxide- styrene)- 1-4 Dioxane in final formulas must comply with the thresholds as follows: (10 or < ppm for products that are meant to be rinsed off- wiped off or removed- 3ppm or < for products that are meant to remain on the skin).  CBD at Sephora Standards 
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive. 
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants* 
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.  
 
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes- other cannabinoids (such as CBG- CBN- or CBC)- flavonoids- and fatty acids. 
-Broad-spectrum CBD: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes- other cannabinoids (such as CBG- CBN- or CBC)- flavonoids- and fatty acids. 
-CBD Isolate: A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included. 
-Testing: Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp- the cannabinoid extract- and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals- solvents- mycotoxins- pesticides- and microbials.

Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: CAXA
details: What it is:  A waterproof roller that kneads your face- neck- and décolletage from every angle to help visibly reduce puffiness for sharper-looking features.What Else You Need to Know:  This facial roller replicates the friction and kneading methods of professional estheticians to help visibly reduce puffiness and fascial distortion for sharper- more enhanced-looking features. A solar panel converts available light into a very mild- soothing microcurrent for increased stimulation- and the platinum coating minimizes irritation- resists tarnishing- and extends use over time. This product conforms with JIS standards for safe use in the shower or jacuzzi.This product contains four essential components. Release Lift: Rollers and precisely-angled Seagull and Crescent CAXA lines replicate the friction- or scooping- and kneading methods of professional estheticians to help visibly reduce puffiness and fascial distortion for sharper-looking- more enhanced-looking features. Microcurrent: A solar panel converts available light into a very mild- soothing microcurrent. Platinum Coating: The surface of the product is coated in platinum to soothe irritation- resist tarnishing- and extend use over time. Waterproof: Conforms with JIS standards (equivalent to IPX7) for safe use in the shower or jacuzzi.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Placing the Crescent Line on your chin- simultaneously slide and scoop back and forth along the line of your cheek toward your ears. -Use it on the forehead- neck- and jawline areas daily.  -Rinse thoroughly with water and pat dry.

-After shampooing- massage the conditioner into wet hair- concentrate on mid-lengths and ends avoiding the scalp.
-Leave in for at least 30 seconds.
-Comb before rinsing well.

name: Summer Essentials Kit
details: What it is:  A summer inspired kit that includes travel friendly beauty products to soothe- quench- relax- and perfect the look of your skin and hair from head to toes.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Pores and DrynessHighlighted Ingredients:- Lavender: Refreshes and relaxes. - Aloe Vera: Quenches and replenishes moisture. - Shea: Moisturizes and smooths.What Else You Need to Know: This set contains six different ingredient-based masks to target specific skin and hair concerns. The Watermelon After-Sun Mask helps quench and perfect the look of your tan. The Aloe Vera Face Mask helps quench and replenish the skin. The Lavender Foot Mask is refreshing and relaxing. The Pineapple Nose Mask helps minimize the look of pores and smooth skin. The Dragonfruit Hair Sleeping Mask helps add shine and protect hair. The Shea Lip Mask helps moisturize and smooth the lips. This Set Contains:- Lavender Foot Mask- Aloe Vera Face Mask- Shea Lip Mask- Watermelon After-Sun Mask- Pineapple Nose Strip- Dragonfruit Hair Mask
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Watermelon After-Sun Mask: -The mask has two parts for the face and décolleté and should be used on clean- dry skin. -Peel off one of the protective films from the face part. -Apply mask to the face- then gently peel off the second protective film. -Peel off one of the protective films from the décolleté part. -Apply mask to the chest- then gently peel off the second protective film.-Leave them on for 15 minutes and then remove. -No need to rinse. Aloe Vera Face Mask: -Unfold the mask and peel off the colored film. -Apply the mask to clean- dry skin. -Leave on for 15 minutes. -Remove the mask and massage any excess product into the skin.-No need to rinse. Lavender Foot Mask: -Put the socks on clean- dry feet. -Peel the paper film off the tab- then fold around the ankle and press to close well. -Leave them on for 20 minutes.-Gently massage any excess product into the skin. -No need to rinse. -Be careful not to slip! Avoid walking with the masks on feet and remove excess product after use.Pineapple Nose Mask: -Unfold the mask and remove the protective film from one side of the mask. -Apply the mask to clean- dry skin. Peel off the second protective film. -Adjust the mask’s position if necessary.-Leave on for 15 minutes- then gently remove the mask. -No need to rinse. Dragonfruit Hair Sleeping Mask: -Before bed- apply the cream hair mask all over dry hair- focusing on ends. -Place cap over hair and let it work overnight. -In the morning- rinse well and wash if necessary. Shea Lip Mask: -Unfold the mask and remove the protective film from one side of the mask. -Apply the mask to the lips then peel off the second protective film. -Adjust the mask’s position if necessary. -Leave on for 15 minutes- then remove the mask and gently massage any excess product into the lips. -No need to rinse.
ingredients: Aloe Vera Face Mask: -Aloe Vera: Quenches and replenishes. name: Heart Gift Card
details:
What it is:
- Available in denominations of $10 to $250.
- Redeem Gift Cards of $50 or more for a complimentary 45-minute Custom Makeover with a Beauty Advisor.*
- Includes a sleek- black- dual-mirrored compact- embossed with the Sephora logo and a gift box. 
- Can be redeemed on merchandise purchases in store- on Sephora.com- on our U.S. mobile app- and at Sephora inside JCPenney stores.**
- Doesn't expire- and both the balance and transaction history can be checked online or in any Sephora store.

What else you need to know:
 All Gift Cards should be treated like cash. They cannot be replaced if lost or stolen. Gift Cards cannot be redeemed or exchanged for cash except as required by law.


To purchase multiple Gift Cards- please call Customer Service at 1-877-SEPHORA.


To see our full Gift Card Terms & Conditions- please visit www.sephora.com/giftcardterms.


*When you purchase product or redeem a Gift Card valued at $50 or more- you are eligible to receive a complimentary 45-minute Custom Makeover. Custom Makeover must occur at the time of purchase or redemption. Custom Makeovers are currently offered in US and Canadian Sephora Stores (not including Sephora inside JCPenney). Please visit  Sephora.com/beautystudio or call a store to book an appointment for a Custom Makeover.


**If a Gift Card is redeemed at a U.S. Sephora inside JCPenney store- it must have been originally purchased in the U.S.

name: Flaunt it Butt Sheet Mask - Retexturizing + Rejuvenating
details: What it is:  A sheet mask packed with enzymes to retexturize and rejuvenate the look of flaky- dry- and dehydrated skin. Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Loss of firmness and elasticity- fine lines- wrinkles- dullness- and uneven texture.Formulation: MaskHighlighted Ingredients:- Watermelon: Retexturizes and rich in lycopene. - Mango: Plump the look of skin and hydrates. - Kiwi Extract: Rich in enzymes and antioxidants. - Glycolic Acid: Exfoliates and hydrates. Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also cruelty-free. What Else You Need to Know:  This mask helps reduce the appearance of fine lines- leaving your skin plump- dewy- and perfectly hydrated.  From Sweaty leggings to sitting down for hours- your butt skin goes through a lot. It's as sensitive as the skin on your face- so it's about time you show it some love.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply to clean skin as shown.-Keep on for 10 to 15 minutes.-Peel sheets off.
ingredients: -Watermelon: Retexturizes and rich in lycopene. -Mango: Plump the look of skin and hydrates. -Kiwi Extract: Rich in enzymes and antioxidants. -Glycolic Acid: Exfoliates and hydrates. name: Total Coverage Angled Sponge
details: What it is: A unique- angled sponge that is designed for applying and blending all formulas and now comes in a new color and reusable packaging used to hold and dry. What Else You Need to Know: Rounded on one side and angled like a wedge on the other- this sponge provides versatile application that complements any look. The rounded edge helps blend formulations seamlessly- while the uniquely shaped wedge cut allows you to access all the right creases.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Soak sponge with warm water and squeeze out any excess.-Pick up formula and blend into skin using the rounded edges.-Use the angled top edge to get to hard-to-reach areas such as underneath the eyes- around the nose and mouth- and along the brow bone. -After use- rinse sponge with warm water and a sponge cleaning soap. -Rest back onto the drying base of the original case- keeping it in a cool- dry area.-Do not wring/twist the sponge and avoid using fingernails during use and cleaning as this can cause it to tear.

name: Strengthening & Power Set
details: What it is: A set that strengthens skin to maximize the appearance of wrinkle-smoothing effects provided by your moisturizer.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and WrinklesWhat Else You Need to Know:  Strengthen and smooth wrinkles for dewy and defended skin. Featuring Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate for 28 percent stronger skin in just one week*- as well as travel-sized essentials to complete your look and target the appearance of wrinkles. *Tested on intentionally irritated skin. Inner skin defenses index (based on moisture retention rate and transepidermal water loss) improved by 28 percent- one week after application.            This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30 mL Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate - 1 oz/ 30 mL Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Day Cream SPF 23 - 4 x facial cotton pieces

name: Future Solution LX Universal Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50+
details:
What it is:  A luxurious daytime cream that protects against environmental stressors for a smooth- radiant look.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles- Dullness- and Uneven Texture Formulation: CreamHighlighted Ingredients:- Aggressor Control Technology (SkingenecellEnmei and Golden Oyster Mushroom Complex): SkingenecellEnmei: Shiseido’s proprietary- youth pro-longing ingredient; Golden Oyster Mushroom Complex: Suppresses damage from environmental stressors- while maintaining moisture in the skin.
- Aura Radiance Technology: Creates a makeup effect of glowing vitality by diffusing light.
- Cashmere Touch Emulsion Technology: Creates a dewy- natural looking finish with unique emulsification technology.                
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens- phthalates- and hydroquinone. What Else You Need to Know: This cream features aggressor control technology for exceptional defense against environmental stressors such as air pollution- changes in temperature- and changes in humidity throughout the day. This dewy- cashmere-soft- and non-oily cream also softens the look of skin and infuses it with moisture even in severe conditions.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Use as the last step of your skincare routine. -Take the recommended amount onto the palm of your hand and smooth over the face. -When using as a makeup base: apply one pearl-size drop; when using as a UV protector: apply two pearl-size drops.-Can be used on a wide range of areas such as the face- hands- and body.-Can be used as a makeup base.
ingredients:
-Aggressor Control Technology (SkingenecellEnmei and Golden Oyster Mushroom Complex): SkingenecellEnmei: Shiseido’s proprietary- youth pro-longing ingredient; Golden Oyster Mushroom Complex: Suppresses damage from environmental stressors- while maintaining moisture in the skin.

name: Spring Reset Kit For Oily/Combo Skin
details:
What it is:  
A mini-regimen that exfoliates- resurfaces- and weightlessly hydrates.

Skin Type: Combination and Oily 

Skincare Concerns: Pores- Dullness- and Oiliness

Formulation: Lightweight Lotion

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Salicylic Acid (BHA) from White Willowbark: Exfoliates. 
- Glycolic (AHA) from Sugar Cane: Exfoliates. 
- Chia Seed Water Gel from Chia Seeds: Hydrates. 

 Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan- cruelty-free- and reef safe- and comes in recyclable packaging. 

What Else You Need to Know: The Regenerating Cleanser is a daily exfoliating treatment. The Resurfacing Serum is a daily dose of glow. The Hyaluronic Gel Moisturizer is a daily weightless hydrator.

This Set Contains:
- 1.69 oz/ 50 mL Regenerating Cleanser 
- 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Resurfacing Serum  
- 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Hyaluronic Gel Moisturizer  

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients- including sulfates (SLS and SLES)- parabens- phthalates- and more. For the full list- check out the Ingredients tab.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Regenerating Cleanser: 
-Apply onto dry skin. 
-Massage a quarter-size amount onto face and neck until product turns white- then rinse with warm water.

Resurfacing Serum: 
-Apply onto clean skin. -Massage one to two pumps onto face and neck. 
-Use AM and PM.

Hyaluronic Gel Moisturizer: 
-Massage one to two pumps onto face and neck. 

 Precautions:
-Avoid direct contact with eyes.
-This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen- wear protective clothes- and limit sun exposure after using this product for a week afterwards.

name: Brightening Duo
details:
What it is:  A two-step ritual that combines the visibly brightening and smoothing benefits of vitamin C and AHAs and amplifies them hydration that plumps the looks of skin. Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots- Dullness- and Uneven TextureFormulation: Lightweight SerumHighlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin C 20% and Japanese Beautyberry: A fast-acting- moisturizing vitamin C derivative absorbs quickly into skin to fight aging from daily free radical assault; helps support surface cell turnover for firmer looking skin while also improving moisture levels; remains in skin longer- helping to protect skin from oxidation and reduce UV damage for brighter skin over time.                
- Mild Fruit AHAs 10%: Gentle yet effective acids remove debris and the buildup of dead skin cells for smooth- radiant skin; derived from seven fruits (apple- grapefruit- orange- lemon- lime- hawthorn- and jujube).                
- Japanese Angelica Root: An edible plant prized for centuries in herbal medicine for its recovery benefits- it helps reduce the appearance of dark spots- discoloration- and post-acne scarring from the source; helps to diffuse accumulated excess melanin- a cause of hyperpigmentation- resulting in visibly more even skin tone.
 Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free- and are reef safe. What Else You Need to Know: The Essence maximizes the performance of all skincare by flooding the skin with hydration- delivering the Violet-C Brightening Serum more effectively. With two types of vitamin C and mild AHAs- this gently effective serum reduces the look of dark spots and evens the appearance of skin’s tone for smooth- radiant-looking skin. This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30mL Violet-C Brightening Serum- 25 oz/ 75 mL The EssenceClean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients- including sulfates (SLS and SLES)- parabens- phthalates- and more. For the full list- check out the Ingredients tab.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Use in the evening after cleansing and before any other skincare.-Press a palmful of The Essence onto the skin on your face and neck. -Let it absorb for seven seconds.-Massage one to two pumps of Violet-C Brightening Serum onto skin.
ingredients:

-Mild Fruit AHAs 10%: Gentle yet effective acids remove debris and the buildup of dead skin cells for smooth- radiant skin; derived from seven fruits (apple- grapefruit- orange- lemon- lime- hawthorn- and jujube).

name: Mini Discovery Collection Set
details: Fragrance Description: Discover which fine fragrance makes you feel your best with this set of trial-size Eau de Parfum vials of Florence- Stella- Giulietta- Cleopatra- Simone- Maya- Colette- and Gia. Florence is a classic floral fragrance that captures your effortless charm. Inspired by the style and sophistication of the city of Paris- Florence is a chic blend of bright bergamot- lush pear- and delicate gardenia. It is a timeless indulgence you’ll fall in love with again and again. Stella is a fresh floral fragrance that embraces your flirtatious spirit. It is inspired by a spontaneous romance and is a bright and breezy blend of lavish Italian citrus- sweet freesia- and spicy lily. It is a playful indulgence for your inner coquette. Giulietta is a fresh floral fragrance that beckons your inner muse. A tribute to youthful- feminine charm- Giulietta is an enchanting blend of delicate pink tulips- fresh green apples- and sweet vanilla orchid. A romantic indulgence sure to inspire great art and passion. Cleopatra is a warm floral fragrance that evokes your powers of seduction. Inspired by the iconic queen- Cleopatra is a captivating blend of brilliant grapefruit and enchanting Egyptian jasmine with a warm embrace of vanilla musk. It is an intoxicating indulgence for those who capture hearts and minds. Simone is that naturally radiant- sun-kissed beauty the whole world adores. It’s no wonder her fragrance- a blissful luxury of watery fruits and tropical florals- is a happiness-inducing scent. Smell yourself- smile- and see who comes your way. Distinctive and confident- Maya exudes strength of character with a rare joining of wild iris- sweet violet leaf- and black currant. The scent is cocooned in elegance as rose damascena and jasmine wrapped with patchouli heart and oakmoss- creating the ultimate expression of thoughtfulness in beauty. Colette is inspired by- Colette- the great French female novelist. Her 1940’s Parisian sensuality comes alive today in a redolent fragrance suffused with curious citrus- feminine floralcy- and masculine woods. This is a perfume that dares you to ask and to be asked. A lavish Turkish rose absolute expresses passion and is given flight by notes of feminine power and purity in Gia. Pink peppercorn and tangerine lift the rose with wings- while golden amber and sandalwood velveteen cushion Gia with pure beauty. This fragrance honors the art and power of individual creativity.This set contains:- 8x 0.05 oz/ 1.47 mL Eau de Parfum Vials in Florence- Stella- Giulietta- Cleopatra- Simone- Maya- Colette- GiaAbout the Fragrance: TOCCA celebrates the art of indulgence- and is inspired by old-world romance and charm.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

options: - 1.7oz/50mL Eau de Parfum Spray  - 8.5oz/250mL Eau de Parfum Decanter
details:
Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody   

Scent Type: Earthy Greens & Herbs    

Key Notes: Clary Sage- Tobacco Leaf- Cedarwood    

Fragrance Description: Impulsive. Debonair. Extravagant. Fougere Platine features earthy greens- herbs- and woods. Opulent doses of refreshing woods magnetize you like the shining gleam of platinum. It inhabits the exhibitionist at his most brilliant—mischievous- indulgent- and infinitely exhilarating.                                                       

About the Bottle: Fougere Platine has the sleek architectural look of a chess piece.


About the Fragrance: "There have been many monumental fougères for centuries- which is why I have waited to introduce my first fougère until I knew it was a masterpiece. It had to be something that would stick to your memory- something that a new generation would find unforgettable."—Tom Ford                    .
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. 
-After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

 Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: Damn Girl, Those Lashes & Lips! Set
details: What it is: A set that Includes a travel-size Damn Girl! 24-Hour Mascara and Lip Injection Extreme Instant & Long Term Lip Plumper.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. These products are also cruelty-free and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: Damn Girl! Mascara is a high-intensity mascara for maximum drama and lift. Innovative polymers keep lashes flexible while lifting- lengthening- and locking in up to 24 hours of smudge- and flake-resistant curl. Lip Injection Extreme & Long Term Lip Plumper is a visible lip plumper for fast satisfaction and long-term results.This Set Contains:- 0.2 oz/ 6 mL Damn Girl! Mascara Mini- 0.1 oz/ 3 g Lip Injection Extreme Instant & Long Term Lip Plumper
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:Damn Girl! Mascara: -Begin at the base of your lashes and sweep the wand outward and upward from root to tip until desired intensity is achieved. -Repeat with additional coats for even more extreme drama.Lip Injection Extreme: -Apply directly on clean dry lips morning and night and throughout the day as your visible lip-plumping treatment. Precautions:-You may experience a slightly intense tingle that can last up to sfive to 10 minutes. -Apply only within perimeter of lips. -If applied on skin- a temporary redness may occur.-If any discomfort is present- remove and discontinue use. -Keep away from children.

name: Ghost Wash & Go for Light Tones
details:
What it is: A limited-edition- blonde-specific set that features a mini Ghost duo and a full size Dry Shampoo Light to instantly refresh for dry styling days.    
Hair Type: Straight- Wavy- and Curly 
Hair Texture: Fine- Medium- and Thick
Hair Concerns: Frizz- Oiliness- and Color Fading
Fragrance Type: Citrus and Woods
Highlighted Ingredients:
- Moringa Seed Oil: Moisturizes- detangles- and smooths dry- unruly hair.  
- Pro-vitamin B5: Moisturizes and smooths dry hair- naturally thickens hair- and gives hair body and hold while hydrating the scalp.  
- Sunflower Seed Extract: Provides natural UV protection while guarding against dryness- color fading- and brassiness.  
 Ingredient Callouts:  Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- and mineral oil. This product is also cruelty-free- and gluten-free.
What Else You Need to Know: Designed for fine and easily weighed down hair- moringa oil-infused Ghost Shampoo™ works to gently cleanse- protect color- and strengthen hair from the inside out as Ghost Conditioner™ weightlessly hydrates- smooths frizz- and promotes radiant shine for all hair types. For those days when you want to skip your shower routine- re-energize second day hair- preserve blowouts- and add natural volume with Dry Shampoo Light—formulated with pro-vitamin B5 to condition and naturally thicken hair from root to ends.     
This Set Contains:
- 2.3 oz/ 68 mL Ghost Shampoo™
- 2.3 oz/ 68 mL Ghost Conditioner™
- 4.5 oz/ 164 mL Dry Shampoo Light
- Verb Net Bag
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:Ghost Shampoo™:-Massage into small amount to wet hair- lather well- and rinse.-Follow with Ghost Conditioner™.
Ghost Conditioner™: -Work through clean- wet hair- and leave in for three to five minutes. -Rinse Thoroughly.
Dry Shampoo Light:-Shake well and spray eight to 10 inches away from roots. -Massage into scalp- brush out- and style away.

name: Mini Bright Crystal and Bright Crystal Absolu Set
details: Bright Crystal is sheer sensuality- crystal transparency- and luminous brightness—a precious jewel of rare beauty characterized by a fresh- vibrant- flowery scent. One of Versace's most beloved jewel-fragrances in the world.Bright Crystal Absolu is the intense version where the essence of Bright Crystal is enhanced to the extreme. Absolu is a floral and fruity fragrance with a musk note.This set contains:- 0.17 oz/ 5 mL Bright Crystal Miniature Deluxe- 0.17 oz/ 5 mL Bright Crystal Absolu Miniature Deluxe
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.
ingredients: Bright Crystal: Alcohol Denat. Bright Crystal Absolu: Alcohol Denat. Scent Type: Powdery Florals

Key Notes: Bergamot- Pear Accord- Ambrette

Fragrance Description: Flowerbomb Dew is a floriental musky perfume- an olfactory bomb of fresh flowers designed from dewy rose accord. The rose is infused with transparent morning dew for a scent that melts in your skin. Envelope yourself in comforting musks and sensual iris for a glowy- second skin floral sensation.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. 
-After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. 
-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. 
-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

 Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:
The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: Spicebomb Set
details: Fragrance Family: Warm & SpicyScent Type: Woody SpicesKey Notes: Cinnamon- Vetiver- SaffronFragrance Description: An explosive encounter between two accords with detonating tones: the first- explosive- fuses zesty- fresh notes while the cold spices leave their icy bite. The second- addictive- combines a middle note of incandescent spices with a wholly masculine combination of leather and tobacco as well as the brute force of vetiver.About the Bottle: The bottle- a reworked custom-built grenade for a perfume made up of explosive scents- is encircled by a black band that cannot contain the force of the fragrance. An olfactory explosion is ineluctable.This set contains:- 3 oz/ 88.7 mL Eau de Toilette- 3.4 oz/ 100 mL After Shave BalmAbout the Fragrance: In 2005- Viktor&Rolf launched its first bomb: a profusion of flowers in a feminine perfume- sensual to the point of excess—Flowerbomb. Today- it is the turn of the masculine codes of perfumery to be dynamited: Spicebomb offers us the promise of a concentrate with an explosive personality. Deliberately powerful- exaggeratedly sensual- decidedly audacious.

name: Full Conditioner
details: What it is: A luxurious conditioner that visibly thickens hair with each use without weighing hair down.Hair Type: Straight and WavyHair Texture: Fine and MediumKey Benefits: Conditions- Plumps- and Revives Formulation: Lightweight LiquidHighlighted Ingredients:- Pink Pomelo: A nutrient-rich citrus fruit full of vitamins A- C- and B1 and zinc to give hair a shot of vitality.- Artichoke Leaf: A nurturing botanical loaded with lipids and protein that helps seal and strengthen hair’s cuticle.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- formaldehyde-releasing agents- phthalates- mineral oil- retinyl palmitate- oxybenzone- coal tar- hydroquinone- triclosan- and triclocarban- and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free- and comes in recyclable packaging.What Else You Need to Know:  Infused with a first-of-its-kind Alpha Keratin 60ku® protein- Full Conditioner was specifically developed to add volume and density to fine- limp hair strands. This extraordinarily lightweight formula helps build volume from the inside out and will continue to improve the health of hair over time. The revitalizing citrus- floral blend features leafy greens- flowers and fruit- including white pear notes- stimulating spearmint leaf- and bright lemon essential oils.Clinical Results: In a consumer perception study of 55 women who used Full Shampoo and Conditioner for 1 week- after 7 uses:- 84% of women said their hair felt thicker - 87% of women said their hair had more body - 86% of women said their hair looked fuller
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Work a quarter-size amount of conditioner between palms.-Apply to wet hair- from mid-shaft to ends.-Rinse thoroughly.

details: What it is: A set that will help refine- de-frizz- and hydrate hair. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:All Hours Foundation: For lighter coverage: -Pump a dime-size amount of foundation onto the back of your hand. -Swipe along your cheeks- forehead- and nose- blending out and down. -The warmth from your fingertips will help the foundation melt into your skin. For higher coverage: -Squeeze two drops onto a paddle brush. -Gently buff the foundation into skin for a flawless-looking complexion and matte finish. For buildable coverage: -Use a makeup sponge. -Wet and squeeze excess water from the sponge and use it to bounce the foundation across the skin. -Repeat application for more coverage. Touche Eclat Blur Primer: -For a perfect sun-kissed glow- try Touche Eclat Blur Primer Gold in your daytime routine.-For an instant brightening look- try Touche Eclat Blur Primer Silver before a night out.                                                                                                                                                                                                          -Primer may be applied under foundation to create a perfected canvas or worn alone to maximize visible radiance. -Apply one pump of primer on the back of the hand. -Using the Yves Saint Laurent foundation brush (sold separately) or your fingers- apply with gentle sweeping motions from the center of the face outward. -Leave to melt into skin for 10 seconds before applying foundation.

details: Fragrance Family: FloralScent Type: Fruity FloralsKey Notes: Black Currant- Rose- White MuskFragrance Description: Mon Paris Intensément is the new daring take on the classic Eau de Parfum. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.
ingredients: unknown

name: Weekend Warrior Tone Up Cream
details: What it is: A weightless complexion booster- infused with skincare benefits- visibly brightens and blurs and evens out skin's appearance.Coverage: Light  Finish: Natural  Formulation: Cream Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan.What Else You Need to Know: This cream is inspired by the K-beauty trend- providing a sheer veil of color to give a brightening and visibly toning effect to skin. It smooths the look of the complexion and contains kumquat extracts- blurring imperfections and reducing the appearance of discoloration to leave the skin visibly perked up- dewy- and weekend ready.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Use this product as the last step in your skincare routine or as the first step in your makeup routine. -The sheer coverage is just enough to visibly correct redness and even out the look of skin’s tone. -Due to the sheer pigments in this formula- the shade range will work for a wide variety of skin tones.  -Squeeze out a dime-size amount of the product- and use clean fingertips to apply an even layer to clean- dry skin.
ingredients: Aqua (Water)- Dimethicone- Isohexadecane- Polymethylsilsesquioxane- Butylene Glycol- Polysilicone-11- Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone- C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate- Isododecane- Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride)- Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone- Talc- Phenoxyethanol- Sodium Chloride- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)- Magnesium Sulfate- Sodium Dehydroacetate- Sodium Benzoate- Quaternium-18 Hectorite- Sodium Citrate- Benzoic Acid- Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides)- Dehydroacetic Acid- Hydrogen Dimethicone- Laureth-12- Propylene Carbonate- Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides)- Glycerin- Ethylhexylglycerin- Aluminum Hydroxide- Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)- Citrus Japonica Fruit Extract- Citric Acid.

name: Happy Birthday Gift Card
details:
What it is:
- Available in denominations of $10 to $250- with a happy birthday message.
- Redeem Gift Cards of $50 or more for a complimentary 45-minute Custom Makeover with a Beauty Advisor.*
- Includes a sleek- black- dual-mirrored compact- embossed with the Sephora logo and a gift box.
- Can be redeemed on merchandise purchases in store- on Sephora.com- on our U.S. mobile app- and at Sephora inside JCPenney stores.**
- Doesn't expire- and both the balance and transaction history can be checked online or in any Sephora store.

What else you need to know:
 All Gift Cards should be treated like cash. They cannot be replaced if lost or stolen. Gift Cards cannot be redeemed or exchanged for cash except as required by law.


To purchase multiple Gift Cards- please call Customer Service at 1-877-SEPHORA.


To see our full Gift Card Terms & Conditions- please visit www.sephora.com/giftcardterms.


*When you purchase product or redeem a Gift Card valued at $50 or more- you are eligible to receive a complimentary 45-minute Custom Makeover. Custom Makeover must occur at the time of purchase or redemption. Custom Makeovers are currently offered in US and Canadian Sephora Stores (not including Sephora inside JCPenney). Please visit Sephora.com/beautystudio or call a store to book an appointment for a Custom Makeover.


**If a Gift Card is redeemed at a U.S. Sephora inside JCPenney store- it must have been originally purchased in the U.S.
